EmailTemplate.description: This is a welcome email to new partner portal users and INCLUDES the NSC Portal User Guide
EmailTemplate.name: Partner Portal - New User
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to NCR SalesCentral Partner Portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
We would like to welcome you to the NCR SalesCentral Partner Portal. Provided below is the URL for accessing the login screen as well as your login and password, which are found at the bottom of this message. If you do not see these initially, please be sure and scroll down to the very bottom of this message.
URL to login: http://nscportal.ncr.com
Attached to this message is the user guide that will assist with the use of NSC.
If you have questions or need assistance please contact your NCR Partner Manager or email us at channels.team@ncr.com.
Thanks,
NCR Global Programs Team
